verses.text: Ach in Diosal, swal wach' lolonel t'ayach, manh ach b'at mikan t'a in lesal.
Yujto a heb' sk'ulan chukal yet' heb' tz'ak'an musansatil anima, chuk syal heb' t'a in patic. Esnhej tas syal heb' chi' t'a in patic.
Ha schichonk'olal heb' ste oymaj t'a in patic. Tz'och chi'an sk'ol heb' t'ayin, palta malaj in mul t'a heb'.
Ha spak in wach'k'olal t'a heb', to tz'och heb' ajk'olal t'ayin. Ha inxo jun, wan in lesalwi yuj heb'.
Ha in wach' pensaril t'a heb', chuk syutej heb' spactzitan t'ayin. Axo spak in wach'k'olal t'a heb', to schichon sk'ol heb' t'ayin.
Ha junok winh chuk spensar tzak'och juezal t'a yib'anh winh. Aokab' junok yajk'ool winh tz'ak'ankanb'at t'a yib'anh.
Ayic sch'olb'itaj winh, alchajokab'i to ay smul winh. Ochokab' pax slesal winh smuloc.
Tzapanokab' tzutej sk'inal winh. Ch'ocokab' pax mach tz'ochkan t'a yopisio winh.
Mheb'a' uninokab' tz'ajkan heb' yuninal winh. Axo ix yetb'eyum winh, kanokab' ix t'a manh etb'eyumal.
Ek'okab' heb' yuninal winh sk'an wa sb'ha t'a titac pat. Pechchajokab'el heb' b'aj ek'nac spat.
Ik'chajokab' ek' masanil tastac ay t'a heb' yuj winh tz'ak'an tumin majanil. Ik'chajokab'b'at smunlajel winh yuj heb' ch'oc animail.
Malajokab' mach tz'ok' sk'ool t'a winh. Malajokab' pax mach tz'ok' sk'ol t'a heb' yuninal winh mheb'haxo.
Satokab'el yinhtilal winh, satokab'el sb'i winh t'a junelnhej.
Mamin Jehová, nacot smul heb' smam yicham winh. Mokab' a suc sat smul snun winh.
Naanokab' smul heb' uuj. Mocxob' nachajcot heb' t'a sat lu'um tik.
Yujto manh naanoc yak'an wach'k'olal winh. Palta to ix och winh ajk'olal t'a heb' meb'a', t'a heb' anima emnaquil yeq'ui yet' t'a heb' ayoch t'a ilk'olal, masanto smilcham heb' winh.
Skatab'ej anima winh, cotokab' katab' t'a yib'anh winh. Malajokab' b'ak'uinh scha wach'k'olal winh yujto maj yak'laj swach'k'olal winh t'a heb' anima chi'.
Axonhej katab' syal winh, ichato a katab' chi' spichul winh yaji. Ha katab' chi', icha ha' siquil ha' scuk'ej, ma icha aceite sko suquek' t'ayonh, icha chi' yaj t'a winh.
Cotokab' yaelal t'a yib'anh sniwanil winh yuj skatab'an heb' anima chi', icha smuschaj ko niwanil yet' ko pichul. Ochokab'kan sut'an yaelal chi' t'a winh t'a masanil tiempo icha junok tzek'ul.
Mamin Jehová, ichaokab' tik tzutej heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, aton heb' tz'alan in pecal.
Ha achxo pax ach Jehová Vajalil, ak'cot a wach'k'olal t'a wib'anh yic ol ach ik'jocchaanh. Yuj a wach'k'olal t'ayin, colineli.
Te meb'a' in, manhxo animaoc wed'nac swutej wab'ani, icha wal to lajwinac in swab'i.
Van in satel icha junok enhul. Van wik'jib'at yuj ik' ichoc nok' k'ulub'.
Van yib'xi sjolom in penec, manhxalaj wip yujto maxtzac in walaj. Van in b'akb'i.
Tzheb'ajtac wilji t'a heb' anima. Ayic tzin yilan heb', sb'uchwaj heb' t'ayin.
Mamin Jehová, ochanh wed'oc. Ach in Diosal, colinel yuj a wach'k'olal.
Mamin Jehová, yojtaquejokab'el heb' anima to a ach ix in utej icha tik.
Malaj yelk'och in skatab'an heb' tato a ach tzak'cot a wach'k'olal t'ayin. Q'uixwokab' heb' yacb'an wan stzalaj in k'ol a in a chekab' in tik.
Ha heb' tz'alan in pecal, chamokab' heb' yuj q'uixwelal. Toxonhejokab' sat sk'ol heb' yuj q'uixwelal.
Mamin Jehová, ol wak' yuj diosal t'ayach t'a masanil tiempo. D'a skal tzijtumal anima ol wal wach' lolonel t'ayach ach in Diosal,
yujto Yalumal heb' meb'a' aji. Ha ach tza colel heb' t'a yol sk'ab' heb' snib'ej yak'anoch chamel t'a yib'anh heb'.
